data.text: Di madagoaa nia daangada gu modoho gi daha gi hongo henuailala, gu hagadili nadau dama ahina,
gei hunu dama a God6.2 nia dama a God be: digau di langi gaa mmada gi nia dama ahina aanei e mmaadanga huoloo, gei digaula gu hai nadau lodo gi nia ahina ala e hiihai ginai.6.2 Job 1.6; 2.1

Gei Dimaadua ga helekai, “Au hagalee dumaalia gi nia daangada gi mouli hua beelaa, digaula digau hua e mouli gaa mmade. Dolomeenei gaa hana hua beelaa, digaula hagalee mouli waalooloo laa hongo nia ngadau e lau madalua (120).”

I lodo hua nia laangi aalaa, ga nomuli labelaa, digau llauehaa nogo i hongo henuailala, aalaa go nia dama nia ahina o henuailala mo digau di langi. Digaula la digau maaloo gei nia daane labelaa e dau namua loo.6.4 Numbers 13.33
Di madagoaa Dimaadua ne mmada bolo digau henuailala huogodoo la gu huaidu huoloo, mo nadau maanadu le e huaidu huoloo i nia madagoaa huogodoo,
gei Mee gu tilikai hualaa i de Ia dela ne hai digaula gaa dugu gi henuailala. Mee guu honu i di lodo huaidu,
dela ga helekai iei Mee boloo, “Au ga haga mmaa gi daha agu daangada ala ne hai, mo nia manu dolodolo mono manu mamaangi, i di Au gu tilikai hualaa i dagu hai ne hai nia maa.”
Gei Dimaadua le e manawa lamalia gi Noah.6.8 Matthew 24.37; Luke 17.26; 1 Peter 3.20

Deenei di kai o Noah. Mee ana dama daane dogodolu, Shem, Ham mo Japheth. Noah tangada haihai mee donu, go mee hua dela nogo humalia i di madagoaa deelaa. Mee e mouli hai hoo ang gi God.6.9-10 2 Peter 2.5
Gei digau huogodoo ala i golo, la digau hai mee huaidu i mua nnadumada o God, gei di huaidu gu modoho i nia madagoaa huogodoo.
God gaa mmada gi henuailala ga gidee bolo ma gu huaidu, i digau huogodoo gu mouli i di mouli huaidu.
God ga helekai gi Noah, “Au gu hagamaanadu bolo Au ga daaligi nia daangada huogodoo gi mmademmade. Au ga hagammaa digaula gi daha, idimaa, henuailala la gu honu hua i nadau hai huaidu.
Hauhia dau boodi gi nia laagau mau, heia nia ruum i no lodo, gaa hunu gi nia ‘tar’ i lodo mo tua, gi dee ulu nia wai gi lodo.
Hauhia gi haa lau madalima (450) piidi di looloo, ge mada hidu maa lima (75) piidi di palaha, ge madahaa maa lima (45) piidi tuuduu.
Heia di gahu tuatala di boodi, gei gi heia di gowaa e madangaholu maa walu ‘inch’ i mehanga di gahu tuatala mo nia baahi. Hauhia gi dolu ono hada, heia di bontai i di baahi.
Au ga haga hali mai agu wai gi henuailala gaa hai henuailala gi doloo, e hagammaa gi daha nia mee ala e mouli huogodoo. Nia mee huogodoo i henuailala la gaa mmade,
gei Au gaa hai dagu hagababa adu gi di goe. Hana gi lodo di boodi, goe mo doo lodo mo au dama daane mo nadau lodo.
Lahia dalia goe nia manu daane mono manu ahina gi lodo di boodi mai i nia hagadilinga manu hongo henua mono manu mamaangi, e haga mouli ai digaula.
Kae ina nia hagadilinga meegai huogodoo e gai go goodou mo nia manu aalaa.”
Malaa, Noah guu hai gii hai be nnelekai a God ala ne hai gi mee.6.22 Hebrews 11.7
